text: Question 43 Consider the two statements below: Statement 1: Ix € Z*, [(8x-5>0) v (2 - x2 > 1)] Statement2: 3x € Z, [(xX2 -3 <0) A (3x-4>0)] Which one of the following alternatives is true regarding statements 1 and 2? 1. Statement 1 is true and statement 2 is false. 2. Statement 1 is false and statement 2 is true. 3. Both statements 1 and 2 are false. 4. Both statements 1 and 2 are true.
